snippet: Senator Marco Rubio’s campaign appears to be leaving little to chance in New Hampshire, aware that a lackluster result would greatly diminish him as he hopes to consolidate Republican support.
abstract: Sen Marco Rubio, coming off surprisingly strong third place finish in Iowa, begins aggressively campaigning in New Hampshire, dispatching scores of canvassers and crafting new lines of attack against opponents; supporters hold success in state could turn tide of Republican primaries in Rubio's favor.
lead_paragraph: Senator Marco Rubio’s campaign appears to be leaving little to chance in New Hampshire, aware that a lackluster result would greatly diminish him as he hopes to consolidate Republican support.

headline.main: Marco Rubio Campaign Dispatches Its Army and New Lines of Attack
headline.print_headline: Rubio Campaign Dispatches Its Army and New Lines of Attack
